title: Barclays chief bans flip-flops from HQ
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Barclays chief bans flip-flops from HQ Flip-flops: the wrong type of footsie for Barclays CorbisRF/Corbis Published 1 minute ago 
Barclays is used to dealing with banking scandals. Banking sandals, however, are a step too far. 
The boss of the bank has written to staff at its Canary Wharf head office after noticing what he deemed to be a distinctly sub-prime trend — bare-toed bankers. 
“Over the past couple of years a range of different dress codes have emerged,” a memo explained. “All colleagues have been asked to adopt business casual as the dress standard when in the office.” 
Friday would remain a designated dress-down day, staff were told, but that emphatically did not extend to more liberal forms of footwear Subscribe now
